data.title: Chris Marsh on LinkedIn: We recently hosted our year end client appreciation event at the Dunes…
data.meta_description: We recently hosted our year end client appreciation event at the Dunes Golf and Beach Club in Myrtle Beach, and it once again exceeded our expectations.  The…
data.text:
Scott Wren explains why it's important for investors to know what is going to occur down the road as it pertains to earnings reporting. https://lnkd.in/eG8Rdnr2

Thinking about firing up the grill this 4th of July? With the worst of food inflation behind us, Wells Fargo has some budget-friendly tips for your star-spangled cookout.

How can investors navigate the near-term economic and market uncertainty and position allocations for 2025 and beyond? Wells Fargo Investment Institute considers five portfolio ideas in light of the current environment and its expectations for the future. https://lnkd.in/eG8Rdnr2

Hear from Darrell Cronk, Chief Investment Officer, as he sheds more light on our Midyear Outlook, discusses year-end 2025 targets, and more with Squawk on the Street.

So far in 2024, the S&P 500 Index has done well compared to past election years. However, looking further out to 2025, Wells Fargo Investment Institute sees potential upside based on both historical performance around election years and its targets. https://lnkd.in/eG8Rdnr2

Scott Wren details how the two-tiered economy and markets offer opportunities of varying degrees for investors in their efforts to position portfolios for the environment that lies ahead. https://lnkd.in/eG8Rdnr2

Using multiple tax-advantaged accounts, like a 401(k) and an IRA, may help you work toward your retirement goals. See our tax planning guide to learn about different account types and the contribution limits. https://lnkd.in/eG8Rdnr2

If you always need to have "background noise" to get things done, you may want to try going back to the basics and embrace the power of silence. Check out why.

Confused about estate planning documents? Check out these common terms and definitions to help build foundational knowledge and ease the planning process. https://lnkd.in/eG8Rdnr2

Not titling assets correctly is a common mistake — and it may circumvent your estate plan. If a trust is a part of your plan, here's how to ensure it will work as you anticipate. https://lnkd.in/eG8Rdnr2
